user

Accessor to the related object on the forward side of a many-to-one or one-to-one (via ForwardOneToOneDescriptor subclass) relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Child.parent is a ForwardManyToOneDescriptor instance.

users_app.tests module

class users_app.tests.AccountActivationTests(methodName='runTest')

Bases: APITestCase

Account activation test class testing account activation after user signup.

setUp()

Setup method extending authentication setup by setting user activity and generating activation objects.

test_activate_double_token_ok()

Tests successful account activation, using a double existing token.

Asserts:

  • 200 OK status.

  • AccountActivation instance (containing the token) was deleted.

test_activate_expired_token_bad_request()

Tests failing account activation, using an expired token.

Asserts:

  • 400 Bad request status.

  • “token” key is in response.

  • Token was deleted.

test_activate_invalid_token_bad_request()

Tests failing account activation, using an invalid token.

Asserts:

  • 400 Bad request status.

  • “token” key is in response.

test_activate_ok()

Tests successful account activation, using an existing token.

Asserts:

  • 200 OK status.

  • AccountActivation instance (containing the token) was deleted.

class users_app.tests.AuthTests(methodName='runTest')

Bases: APITestCase

Authentication tests class testing user registration and login.

setUp()

Creates a user and an associated authentication token.

test_login_false_password_bad_request()

Tests login with incorrect password.

Asserts:

400 Bad Request status.

test_login_inactive_bad_request()

Tests login with inactive account.

Asserts:

  • 400 Bad request status.

test_login_not_registered_bad_request()

Tests login with incorrect password.

Asserts:

400 Bad Request status.

test_login_ok()

Tests successful login with correct credentials.

Asserts:

  • 200 OK status.

  • Absence of username in response data.

  • Presence of required fields in response data.

test_signup_ok()

Tests successful signup with valid credentials.

Asserts:

  • 201 Created status.

  • Created user is inactive.

  • Account activation token was created.

  • Username of new user is “User” plus primary key.

  • Absence of any token or user data in response.

test_signup_passwords_email_exists_bad_request()

Tests signup with non-matching passwords.

Asserts:

  • 400 Bad request status.

class users_app.tests.PasswordResetTests(methodName='runTest')

Bases: APITestCase

Password reset test class testing password resetting.

setUp()

Setup method extending authentication setup by generating password reset objects.

test_perform_reset_expired_token_bad_request()

Tests failing password reset, using an expired token.

Asserts:

  • 400 Bad request status.

  • “token” key is in response.

  • Token was deleted.

test_perform_reset_invalid_token_bad_request()

Tests failing password reset, using an invalid token.

Asserts:

  • 400 Bad request status.

  • “token” key is in response.

test_perform_reset_ok()

Tests successful password reset, using an existing token.

Asserts:

  • 200 OK status.

  • PasswordReset instance (containing the token) was deleted.

test_perform_reset_weak_pw_bad_request()

Tests failing password reset, using an invalid password.

Asserts:

  • 400 Bad request status.

  • “new_password” key is in response.

test_request_invalid_email_bad_request()

Tests failing password reset request due to an invalid email address.

Asserts:

  • 400 Bad request status.

  • “email” key is in response.

test_request_ok()

Tests successful password reset request, creating a new token and replacing an existing one.

Asserts:

  • 200 OK status.

  • Previous PasswordReset instance (containing the token) was deleted.

test_request_unregistered_email_ok()

Tests failing password reset request due to an unregistered email address. For security reasons, the 200 OK status is sent nonetheless.

Asserts:

  • 200 OK status.

  • Length of PasswordReset queryset is the same as before, i.e. no PasswordReset object was created.

class users_app.tests.UserTests(methodName='runTest')

Bases: APITestCase

User test class testing user profile access.

setUp()

Setup method extending authentication setup by logging in the user.

test_get_user_invalid_token()

Tests failing user retrieval by invalid token.

Asserts:

  • 401 unauthorized status.

test_get_user_missing_token()

Tests failing user retrieval without any token.

Asserts:

  • 401 unauthorized status.

test_get_user_ok()

Tests user retrieval by token.

Asserts:

  • 200 OK status.

  • Username and email are not in response.

  • Required fields (ID only) is in response.

users_app.urls module

users_app.utils module

users_app.utils.generate_email_base_data(recipient)

Returns basic data required for every email template.

users_app.utils.get_auth_response_data(user, token)

Constructs an authentication response data dictionary.

users_app.utils.get_domain()

Returns the current domain. In debug mode, a hard-coded value is being used.

users_app.utils.prepare_logo(svg_file)

Prepares the logo SVG to be displayed as an inline image in an email, defining its MIME type and Content-ID.

users_app.utils.render_email_content(template_name, email_data)

Renders email content in plain text and html format. Both alternatives each require a corresponding template in the “emails” directory.

users_app.utils.send_account_activation_email(recipient, activation_url)

Sends an account activation email. The activation URL links to the frontend and must contain a valid token.

users_app.utils.send_email_with_data(subject, template_name, recipient, email_data)

Sends an email to the specified recipient using the specified template and filling it with customizable data.

users_app.utils.send_password_reset_email(recipient, reset_url)

Sends a password reset email. The reset URL links to the frontend and must contain a valid token.
